name: (In progess) Super Magnetic Crush!
description:
Super Meat Boy meets Portal but with Magnets. 

Instead of the boy being a piece of meat, they are a magnetic cube.

And instead of shooting portals, they shoot magnetic orbs. 

Controls:

W - Jump

AD - Move 

Hold shift when moving - Dash/Sprint (Move faster and jump higher)

Left click - shoot blue orb (when available)

Right click - shoot pink orb (when available)

A follow up to previous game: https://stephenjamesborland.itch.io/supermagnetboyboogeytrapzedition

Still in progress
